entries.name: Hellfire Imp
entries: Hellfire Imps embody the Nine Hellâ€™s natural affinity to Fire, and empower themselves with it.

entries.name: Infernal Resilience
entries: Imps are durable creatures, and gain resistance to Fire damage.

entries.name: Invisibility
entries: As an Action, an Imp can magically turn invisible (along with anything its carrying) for up to 1 minute, or casting another spell or making an attack roll, or until its concentration is broken. It can do this a number of times per Long Rest equal to your Proficiency Bonus.

entries.name: Spellcasting
entries: Imps have a natural affinity with magic, and can cast the following spells. You know the {@spell Produce Flame|XGE} Cantrip. At 3rd level, you learn the {@spell Hellish Rebuke|PHB} spell and can cast it once per Long Rest without expending a spell slot for it. At 5th level, you learn {@spell Knock|PHB} and can cast it once per Long Rest without expending a spell slot for it.
Charisma is your spellcasting ability for these spells.
